column4: Could someone help me out with the installing of my propitary ATi drivers? SH gives me an error when I try to run the installer.
There are none listed. So I got the one from ATis site downloaded
sorry to tell you but your card's support has been dropped by the latest release of ati's drivers
Yes but this is the 9.3 that I have downloaded. It says that it's compitable with my card
only 9.4 or 9.5 drivers will work with jaunty
yes we have had to tell a lot of people this
you'll have to talk to ati about it, but you could try the open source driver
So where can I go from here?
do you need to do 3d work?
I'd like to run World of Warcraft and it doesn't seem to be working with the standard open source drivers
well then i guess your only option is to go back to 8.10
Thanks for your time and help
